description: Dharman is a mad cyborg scientist who closely resemble`s a Dharma Doll and has multiple robotic limbs with various tools built onto them to allow him to perform simple and complicated tasks and moves around by hovering. Dharman is mainly responsible for the technological pursuits utilized by the Empty Seven Clan. However, he seems to an ally to the group as opposed to a full-fledged member.
name: Dharman
